title: Venus Transit in the 2nd House for Libra Ascendant
summary: When Venus transits the 2nd house for Libra ascendant, focus shifts to wealth, speech, and family harmony. Financial flow improves through refined skills, pleasant communication, and value-based decisions. Speech becomes attractive and persuasive, supporting income and relationships. Comfort, food, and material pleasures increase, but careless spending can dilute gains. Venus encourages balanced financial choices, reminding that sustainable wealth grows through tasteful restraint rather than indulgence.

sections.heading: Core Personality
points: Sense of self connects with values

closing: This transit supports wealth and harmony. When enjoyment is balanced with restraint, Venus stabilizes finances and family bonds.
